name: Product or process innovation in companies, by industry: 2015–17
description: Product or process innovation in companies, by industry: 2015–17

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_process_innovation_number_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Process Innovation Number Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_process_innovation_number_no
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Process Innovation Number No

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_process_innovation_percent_yes
variableMeasured.description: Product Or Process Innovation Percent Yes

variableMeasured.name: field_product_or_process_innovation_percent_no

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Detail may not add to total because of rounding. Industry classification is based on the dominant establishment payroll. Statistics are representative of companies located in the United States.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics and U.S. Census Bureau, Annual Business Survey, 2017.
